attributes.action: Take a strong stance against the USA if it goes back on climate change promises.
attributes.background: The Republican Party does not accept climate science and opposes regulating climate pollution. The Republican Party will control all the law making bodies in the USA and may repeal climate change laws. Such action is unacceptable & the UK must take the strongest possible stance to stop it.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining what specific action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.
